name: Unstable Stable (Brie Y. R., ssssybil, mokiinwarp, Glavia, HA7Oes, CodeWithIris)
name_original: Unstable Stable (Brie Y. R., ssssybil, mokiinwarp, Glavia, HA7Oes, CodeWithIris)
description:
You need to stable the unstable.

       Then, unstable the stable one.

       Finally, break through what binds you.

       Or,

       Have you ever escaped from the stable?

 

       This game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme “Unstable”.  The game process takes about 8 minutes. It tells a really cute little story. Hope you enjoy it~~~ Please feel free to comment and rate our game!!

       Mouse only (which means you just need to click click click :) )

       Esc to pause (when you need to escape from the stable for a little while :) )

       Brie Y. R. - Programming

       Sybil - Music and Sound

       HA7Oes - Art (Animation)

       Moki - Art

       Brazen - Art

       Iris Zhu - UI
